login.title: Log in
login.subtitle: Log in to access your custom Shira space. If you have trouble logging in, contact us at

beta.label: BETA
beta.message: Shira is still in development and you may experience issues.
beta.feedback_text: to share your feedback and help us improve!

dashboard.title: Welcome to your dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: This is where you can manage quizzes. Quiz links are public, so remember to avoid sharing sensitive information in them.

quiz.subtitle: Manage your quiz here, including adding, removing, and reordering questions

no_questions.subtitle: You don't have any questions yet. Create your own question or add one from the Shira library.

question_name.title: Question name
question_name.subtitle: This name will only visible to you, to help you remember what this question is about

content.phishing: You are writing a phishing message
content.legitimate: You are writing a legitimate message
content.message: On this screen, create the content that will be displayed in the question, including the

sender.title: Sender name
sender.subtitle: This is the name that will be displayed in the "Sender" field of the email.

sender_email.title: Sender email address
sender_email.subtitle: This is the email address that will be displayed in the "Sender" field of the email.

email_subject.title: Email subject
email_subject.subtitle: This will be displayed in the "Subject" field of the email. If you keep this field empty, the subject field will show "(no subject)".

email_body_content.title: Email body content
email_body_content.subtitle: Write the message that will be shown.

explanations.title: Explanations will be shown in the following order in the quiz.

sender_phone.title: Sender phone
sender_phone.subtitle: This is the phone number that will be displayed in the "Sender" field of the message.

message_content.title: Message content
message_content.subtitle: Create the messages that will be shown. You can create multiple messages and image files. Add an explanation by selecting a portion of text and clicking on the explanation icon.

link_text.subtitle: In the quiz, this link will appear clickable, but for safety reasons, clicking on it will not open the URL.

preview.subtitle: This is how your question will look to learners, including the explanations you have written.
preview.no_explanations: There are no explanations for this question.

question_library.tab_header_title: Add a question from the library
question_library.title: Question library
question_library.subtitle: Select a question from list below to add it to your quiz. Once you've added it to your quiz, you can edit the question to fully customize it, including changing the text and explanations.

completed_quizzes.title: Number of completed quizzes
completed_quizzes.subtitle: This is the number of quizzes that have been completed

average_score.title: Average score
average_score.subtitle: This is the average score received by all learners who took this quiz.
average_score.empty_subtitle: The average score received by all learners who took this quiz will be shown here.

support.title: Support
support.subtitle: If you need any support, including with deleting your account, please email the Shira team at contact@wearehorizontal.org

create_quiz.title: Give a name to your new quiz

duplicate_quiz.title: Duplicate quiz
duplicate_quiz.subtitle: Set the name for the new quiz

delete_quiz.title: Are you sure you want to delete "{{quiz_name}}"?
delete_quiz.subtitle: Deleting this quiz is permanent and cannot be undone.
delete_quiz.message: The quiz's Results will also be deleted.

delete_question.title: Are you sure you want to delete {{question_name}}?
delete_question.message: Deleting this question is permanent and cannot be undone.
delete_question.warning: This question's Results will also be deleted, which will affect learners' average scores.

exit_question.title: Are you sure you want to exit the question?
exit_question.message: Any unsaved changes will be lost.

edit_question_confirmation.title: Are you sure you want to edit this quiz?
edit_question_confirmation.message: Some learners have already taken this quiz. Adding or editing questions may affect the accuracy of Results.

variables_modal.title: Variables
variables_modal.message: Variables are placeholders that you can use to insert personalized information into a question.
variables_modal.message2: The information shown is relevant to each learner, based on what they entered or auto-generated during quiz setup.
variables_modal.message3: To add a variable, type the following:
variables_modal.name: name
variables_modal.name_explanation: This will display the learner's name
variables_modal.email_explanation: This will display the learner's email address

explanations_modal.title: Explanations
explanations_modal.message: Explanations are short notes that highlight specific elements of a question and explain why these elements may indicate that a message is a phishing attempt or not.
explanations_modal.message2: To add an explanation, select the explanation icon on the right side of each row. Explanations can be attached to:

list.fields: Fields, such as the sender's name or email address
list.content: Specific parts of the message content

no_explanations.title: Continue without explanations?
no_explanations.message: You haven't created any explanations for this question, so learners will not see any text explaining why the message seems like phishing or seems legitimate.

success_messages.quiz_link_copied: The public quiz link has been copied to your clipboard.
success_messages.quiz_order_updated: The quiz order has been updated
success_messages.question_added: The question has been added to your quiz

preview.no_explanations: There are no explanations for this question.
